Posts.Content: Oct 14, 2010 02:15PM Julie1973 wrote: ladym13 I'm glad I read your post.  I've been falsely thinking that my hair won't fall out.  My second treatment (AC) is Monday 10/18.  I did purchase an unbelievable wig a few weeks ago and was hoping that I wouldn't have to use it even though I spent $$$$$.  My husband keeps telling me to think about what I'm saying because he doesn't want me to be crushed.
